entries.ruin_life: I'll be back! And I'll ruin your life!
entries.dont_hurt_us: Wait! Don't hurt us! We give up!
entries.axkva_min_intro_09_too_far: You must be near the large blue crystal in the Blueleaf Temple.
entries.axkva_min_intro_07_too_far: You must go into the lava pool at the top of Mount Chaolt.
